name: Singapore
scope_notes: Prototype compliance mapping only. Always validate with MAS guidance and Singapore counsel, especially for offers and marketing.
marketing_notes: Offering/marketing restrictions depend on investor class and exemption pathways.
Counsel review required for any public distribution.
licensing_notes: Licensing depends on regulated activity classification and client base.
tokenization_notes: Tokenization requires securities/offer analysis and custody considerations.
crypto_financing_notes: Crypto financing/custody can materially increase compliance obligations.
